author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Department of Posts will conduct divisional level old age pension money orders adalat for at the office of the Senior Superintendent of Post Offices, Salem East Division, Salem city at 11 a.m. on February 29.

The senior citizens, destitute, widows who were not regularly receiving pension through money order could write to the Senior Superintendent of Post Offices, Salem-636 001 or could directly participate in the above divisional adalat to get their grievances solved, a press release issued here by the Department of Posts said.
title: Adalat for pensioners on February 29
